snippet: Jon Lester allowed Maicer Izturis’s two-out double in the sixth inning, and no other base runners, as Boston ended a three-game losing streak.
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester allowed Maicer Izturis’s two-out double in the sixth inning, and no other base runners, as Boston ended a three-game losing streak.

headline.main: Only One Blue Jay Reaches Base as Lester Helps Red Sox End Skid
headline.print_headline: Only One Blue Jay Reaches Base as Lester Helps Red Sox End Skid
